description: Creates a new user in FinSpace.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: The email address of the user that you want to register. The email address serves as a uniquer identifier for each user and cannot be changed after it's created.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The option to indicate the type of user. Use one of the following options to specify this parameter: SUPER_USER --- A user with permission to all the functionality and data in FinSpace. APP_USER --- A user with specific permissions in FinSpace. The users are assigned permissions by adding them to a permission group.

parameters.name: apiAccess
parameters.description: The option to indicate whether the user can use the GetProgrammaticAccessCredentials API to obtain credentials that can then be used to access other FinSpace Data API operations. ENABLED --- The user has permissions to use the APIs. DISABLED --- The user does not have permissions to use any APIs.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the user.
